---
title: "Learning Fair Representations"
author: "Son Phan"
date: '2020-07-01'
summary: Given a dataset with a sensitive attribute (e.g gender, race) we look to
  obtain a representation of the data that has the same dimension as the original
  data, preserves as much of information in the original data as possible, and de-correlates
  the sensitive attribute
